channel.title: A couple of mods
channel.description:
Hello everybody.Please if you aren't interested in downloading this for Moparisthebest.com don't spam.If you aren't interested in downloading for you're forum don't download. All this took was 5 minutes searching in SMF Mods.Don't spam. Here it is : Spam protector mod: http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=544 Contact page : http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=377 (defult theme only :( ) Flash chat :)
I uploaded the just released FlashChat 4.7.8 witch I got from a friend's payment ID. It's also not released anywhere for warez download so it's an exclusive. [code]http://rapidshare.com/files/13564802/FlashChat_v478.rar[/code] or [code]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=KWWOGRR8[/code] Pass: [code]ariskar@whereisit.org[/code]
http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=611 Global announcements :) http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=419 Ignore users. http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=185 Mood changer http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=208 You may not use some of these but you may use 1 or 2.Be cool with it :)

item.title: A couple of mods
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

[quote=“Mod Taharok, post:7, topic:58871”][quote author=moparisthebest link=topic=84330.msg906283#msg906283 date=1171623422]

but doesent uploading take like 30sec? it does for me n e way…

Sure on a normal forum, but when you have 2 different source folders accessing the same database it becomes a very long and time consuming process to add any mod. Which is the reason why I don’t add mods very often, unless I believe it will make a huge difference.
[/quote]

Yes, but we know what happened during the last upgrade…

cough SMF 1.1.2 has come out cough[/quote]
He never upgrades early. Give him like 6 months then he will lol.

Read full topic

item.title: A couple of mods
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:5, topic:58871”][quote author=mvp566 link=topic=84330.msg906037#msg906037 date=1171619834]
but doesent uploading take like 30sec? it does for me n e way…
[/quote]

Sure on a normal forum, but when you have 2 different source folders accessing the same database it becomes a very long and time consuming process to add any mod. Which is the reason why I don’t add mods very often, unless I believe it will make a huge difference.[/quote]

Yes, but we know what happened during the last upgrade…

cough SMF 1.1.2 has come out cough

Read full topic

item.title: A couple of mods
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

I’m using the contact page on my forums also.
Its very helpfull yeah.
But like mopar told, long time.

Read full topic

item.title: A couple of mods
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

mvp566:

but doesent uploading take like 30sec? it does for me n e way…

Sure on a normal forum, but when you have 2 different source folders accessing the same database it becomes a very long and time consuming process to add any mod. Which is the reason why I don’t add mods very often, unless I believe it will make a huge difference.

Read full topic

item.title: A couple of mods
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I already tried Global Announcements on Mopar, but he is too busy to upload them. If you would know that he has to upload these to his home computer forums, then use his awesome Java application, and then reupload the files to the server. He has to do this twice - one time for Moparisthebest.com and a second time for MoparScape.org. This is a reason why Moparisthebest does not install so many useful or just plain useless packages.

Read full topic
